suite2p.utils¶

Module Contents¶

suite2p.utils.tic()[source]¶
suite2p.utils.toc(i0)[source]¶
suite2p.utils.fitMVGaus(y, x, lam, thres=2.5)[source]¶

computes 2D gaussian fit to data and returns ellipse of radius thres standard deviations.

Parameters

  • y (float, array) – pixel locations in y

  • x (float, array) – pixel locations in x

  • lam (float, array) – weights of each pixel

Returns

  • mu (float) – mean of gaussian fit.

  • cov (float) – covariance of gaussian fit.

  • radii (float, array) – half of major and minor axis lengths of elliptical fit.

  • ellipse (float, array) – coordinates of elliptical fit.

  • area (float) – area of ellipse.

computes enhanced mean image for GUI

suite2p.utils.find_files_open_binaries(ops1, ish5)[source]¶

find tiffs or h5 files, and open binaries to write to inputs ops1 (list over planes), ish5 (whether or not h5) returns ops1, fs (filelist), reg_file, reg_file_chan2

suite2p.utils.get_tif_list(ops)[source]¶

make list of tiffs to process if ops[‘subfolders’], then all tiffs ops[‘data_path’][0] / ops[‘subfolders’] / *.tif if ops[‘look_one_level_down’], then all tiffs in all folders + one level down if ops[‘tiff_list’], then ops[‘data_path’][0] / ops[‘tiff_list’] ONLY

suite2p.utils.sub2ind(array_shape, rows, cols)[source]¶
suite2p.utils.combined(ops1)[source]¶

Combines all the entries in ops1 into a single result file. Multi-plane recordings are arranged to best tile a square. Multi-roi recordings are arranged by their dx,dy physical localization.

suite2p.utils.make_blocks(ops)[source]¶
suite2p.utils.sample_frames(ops, ix, reg_file)[source]¶

get frames ix from reg_file frames are cropped by ops[‘yrange’] and ops[‘xrange’]
